title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil spaghetti according to package instructions.
Cook bacon in a pan until crispy.
Whisk eggs and grated parmesan together.
Drain pasta and mix with bacon.
Remove from heat and stir in egg mixture quickly.
Season with salt and black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Grill or cook chicken until done.
Prepare sauce using tomato puree and cream.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
